TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 880
TEI.2.document_title: Anthony Butler to Stephen F Austin, 10-22-1832

barker_notes.barker_summary: Anthony Butler to Austin, October 22, 1832, Draft on Austin for $50.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 880

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Anthony Butler to Austin, October 22, 1832, Draft on Austin for $50.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="10-22-1832">Oct 22 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Will please pay *person_mentioned*Maj. Jesse Bartlett*/person_mentioned* or order one hundred and fifty dollars being in part pay for building a *location_mentioned*stable */location_mentioned*on *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Col Anthony Butler*/person_mentioned*s tavern lot*/location_mentioned* in this place and charge to a/c*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Anthony Butler*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*By*person_mentioned* Jno R Jones Agen*/person_mentioned*t*/p* *p*Recd, on the within thirty two dollars and fifty eight cents *date_mentioned n="10-22-1832">Octr, 22nd 1832*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jessee Bartlett*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*117.42 paid by *person_mentioned*Perry and Hunter */person_mentioned*to a/c *location_mentioned*S F Austin */location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="11-05-1832">5 Nov. 1832*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Perry and Hunter*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Jessee Bartlett*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
